data.title: Home Farm Caravan and Camping Site
data.text:
Walking group, We had a fantastic stay. Thank you so much. Not overcrowded on a bank holiday Monday. Ground perfect, soft no stones, staff helpful, showers clean. Wonderful.

31.05.21.

Had a lovely 2 days on a lovely site, very clean and tidy. Loved watching the bunnies !! Will be back again.

Many thanks xxx 13.06.21

Thank you for having us at your beautiful and very well-kept campsite. I'm sure we'll be back. The views were wonderful and everything was very well organised. Thank you again.

9th April 2017

Thank you for a lovely week-end break. We enjoyed every moment, the site has been very clean and peaceful at all times, and we have been made to feel very welcome. Hope to return again.

17/04/17

We loved our stay. We regret to leave. Thank you so much. your campsite is so beautiful and silent.

17/07.17

Lovely clean site with good facilities. Excellent Service & we all had a brilliant time. Thank you.The Wilding Family & Toby our Very Tired dog.

11.06.2016.

Second visit to this site, really love the location and surroundings. Great walk to Chesil Beach and will certainly be back to explore more.

Blandford Forum

1st - 4th July 2016

Lovely peaceful site in a great location. Site is well maintained by friendly owners. We have had a great time here and will be back again next year.

11th July 2016

This is the best campsite I have ever been on! Run by lovely ladies, very friendly. Great facilities. Great pub nearby.It is a little gem with peace & quiet. I keep coming back because I love it here.

22nd July 2016

Thank you for your warm welcome and continued helpfulness throughout our stay. You keep the site and facilities to a high standard. We had a wonderful 4 nights stay.

31.07.2016.

Thank you so much for letting us stay on your beautifully cared for site, clear facilities, friendly staff, couldn't wish for anything more. We will be back.

09.08.2016.

Fabulous clean & well looked after site - really well located. First time camping for me and the bar is set high - thanks so much for fitting us in too!

August 26th - 29th 2016

Superb setting. lovely walks, ideal for dogs. Site wonderfully maintained, facilities clean and bright. Staff helpful and hard working. Pitches protected from high winds with good space between. Travelling in France sets a high standard which this site meets. Well done, a pleasure to stay with you, see you again.

Sept 1st - Sept 4th 2016

29th May 2016

We have all had a thoroughly wonderful weekend. Beautifully kept grounds and facilities, and very well organised.Thank you all at Home Farm - We shall return x

Thank you for a brilliant holiday, we had a fabulous time and have fallen back in love with camping! Appreciate the charging (phone) and ice pack freezing and lovely staff !

May 2016

If you want a great holiday, don't look any further for a campsite. This site has everything you are looking for. Great friendly and helpful owners, beautiful views, well kept site and the peace and tranquillity you ever ask for. See you again next year x

This site is exactly what the reviews said, quiet, clean, lovely views - We were made welcome when we arrived on Friday night - We will come again.

April 2015

Wonderful week, lovely family friendly campsite, everything you could want - lovely location a little jewel in lovely Dorset.

Thank you so much, we shall be back. May 2015
